oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Making rational decisions about new services
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lewis, Dickson
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: management financials
revenue streams
value proposition
affinity diagramming
partial budget
new services
breakeven
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This presentation offers a methodology and tools to evaluate the profitability and potential financial impact of possible new products and services to your practice. We discuss how to set up your current financial statements to facilitate understanding the impact and three important criteria when considering pos足sible new services. You will be exposed to developing manage足ment financials and profitability of your current and potential revenue streams as well as developing a value proposition with the input of your various constituencies, your own practical ex足perience, and any research you might have. Additionally, you will learn about the use of partial budgets to evaluate the mar足ginal benefit of potential new services, to analyze sensitivities and set reasonable expectations for new products or services, to integrate and track progress into your planning.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2021 Annual Conference Proceedings; 150-157
